thread.title: Great hotel! Would stay again!
thread.title_full: Great hotel! Would stay again! - Review of The Darlington Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: sfoster4az
title: Great hotel! Would stay again!
text: We loved our stay at the Darlington Hyde Park hotel. We were able to walk there from Paddington Station. It's close to Kensington Palace too! The rooms are small, but they all are in England. Very clean room and comfy beds. Free breakfast was great too!
